response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to maximize efficiency and profitability in your industry. Please let me know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make a decision. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 14500}
